name: Cameron Townsend
title: Web Developer & Designer
line1: Innovative and detail-oriented front-end engineer with experience in web development, design, and software engineering, specializing in building intuitive, elegant, and performant user interfaces. Skilled in crafting scalable applications using modern frameworks like React and Vue, with a keen focus on accessibility, responsive design, and cross-browser compatibility. Adept at using data-driven insights to optimize user engagement and elevate digital experiences.
line2: Experienced in full project lifecycles, from ideation to deployment, including requirements gathering, design, coding, testing, and maintenance. Strong communicator, able to clearly convey technical solutions to cross-functional teams and non-technical stakeholders. Thrives in collaborative, Agile environments with a passion for continuous learning and delivering solutions.
